content.rendered:
2024 Summer Games Schedule

The 2024 Summer Games schedule is packed with events featuring 32 different sports. A total of 28 traditional Summer Games sports will be complemented by four recent additions: sport climbing, skateboarding, surfing and breaking, which will make its debut at these Games. Paris’s Summer Games will officially begin with the Opening Ceremonies on July 26th and conclude with the Closing Ceremonies on August 11th, though some sports will have preliminary events prior to the official start. Below you will find the tentative 2024 schedule to help you start planning your ultimate Summer Games experience.
